text: Put it on in that picture. . Somebody climbed up on the thing. You put . jar. . Wash your clothes. I mean, washing dishes. Right? OK. Anything else? That's it. What else do you see going on over here? What's that? Which one? Right here. Right there. Let me see what's going on.
